Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 239 (summary process.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 239 (summary process and local venue provisions)
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 239 (summary process.proposition: Jurisdiction and venue are proper in Cambridge District Court because the property that is the subject of this action is located in Cambridge and the events giving rise to this claim occurred there.

105 CMR 410.000 et seq. (Minimum Standar.raw_text: 105 CMR 410.000 et seq. (Minimum Standards of Fitness for Human Habitation)
105 CMR 410.000 et seq. (Minimum Standar.proposition: The State Sanitary Code sets minimum standards for housing and indoor air quality and requires that residential housing be maintained in a manner that does not create health and safety hazards.
